amendment.purpose: An amendment to make in order as self-executing the amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record in lieu of the amendment numbered 1 which is currently made in order as self-executing by the rule.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Dreier.
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) and on the resolution. Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dreier amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
